name: Drop Mahjong tiles
description:
A fusion of drop-style gameplay with Mahjong!

"Drop Mahjong Tiles" is a Mahjong puzzle game with falling game elements. The actual Mahjong scores directly become your score. Not only Mahjong enthusiasts but also those who are not familiar with Mahjong rules and hands can enjoy it intuitively.

The Mahjong tiles that fall are completely random, and like actual Mahjong, there are only up to four of the same tile. It's not a competitive format, and there's no time limit, so you can take your time and enjoy at your own pace.

The game is over when the screen is filled with tiles. Aim for a high score by clearing the Mahjong tiles!

Keyboard Setting

We have received feedback that the keyboard operation is unclear. We will promptly address this issue here. We will make timely adjustments to the game's navigation display and other features as necessary.

- Stick, Keyboard: Arrow keys, W/A/S/D => Move tiles, cursor
- Xbox A, Sony ✕, Keyboard: K => OK, Drop tiles
- Xbox B, Sony ○, Keyboard: L => Cancel
- Xbox X, Sony □, Keyboard: J => Switch to right board(kawa)
- Xbox Y, Sony △, Keyboard: I => Kan
- Xbox LB, Sony L1, Keyboard: Q => Show Yaku(Hand) description
- Xbox RB/RT, Sony R1/R2, Keyboard: O/E => Speed up for moving tiles
- Xbox Menu, Sony Options, Keyboard: Enter => Pause
